# Satellite_Image_Segmentation


### Deep Learning

### Encapsulation
<div>
    <h1>
    Input Image 
        <h2>
            Size: (512, 512, 3)
        </h2>
        <h2>
            Channel: R - Crop, G - Vinyl, B - Background
        </h2>
    </h1>
    <h1>
        Output Image
        <h2>
            Size
            <h3>
                Option "B": (512, 512, 3) 
            </h3>
            <h3>
                Option "C" (Crop): (512, 512) 
            </h3>
            <h3>
                Option "V" (Vinyl): (512, 512) 
            </h3>
        </h2>
    </h1>
</div>
